name: ASCII Game Series: Maze
description:
Enjoy the long forgotten minimalistic retro game concept with relaxing music.
It is a retro arcade game featuring simple two-dimensional ASCII graphics and was inspired by original games of 80's.


The game consists of procedurally generated maze the complexity of which increases with each level. Each level has a number of items, collecting which level is completed
The primary objective of the game is to score as many levels as possible.Features:
  • classic game concept
  • retro ASCII graphic style
  • ambient music
  • 5000 Steam achievements
